This website uses cookies to provide you with a better experience.

You can adjust your cookie settings at any time at the bottom of each page.  If you do not adjust your settings, you are consenting to us issuing all cookies to you.

    What's On At Brighton Change cinema Show films from all cinemas


    Previews September 08!

    People's Choice

    Lucy

    171 people want to see the film.


    Madama Butterfly - On Sydney Harbour

    A spectacular modern retelling of Puccini's heart-rending opera on a magnificent water stage suspended over Sydney Harbour.

    About Cineworld Brighton

    Cineworld Brighton is an 8-screen cinema located within Brighton Marina on the seafront. The complex is served by a free car park and a wide range of restaurants in short proximity.


    Experience The Following:

    3D Movies for juniors Autism Friendly
    Facilities, location & ticket prices
